name: part_009
file: tmp_【#アキロゼ4周年LIVE】全編歌ライブ！みんなと歌って踊って3D LIVE 「ROSE of the LAMP」【アキ・ローゼンタール⧸ホロライブ】 [mknggf96fuI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Saikai' by Aki Rosenthal and Natsuiro Matsuri in a cathedral-themed stage.
Performance of the song 'Uta yo' by Aki Rosenthal in a digital, futuristic environment.

subtitles.original: 今もずっと
subtitles.english: Even now, forever

subtitles.original: ずっと見つめたまま
subtitles.english: forever staring at you.

subtitles.original: 降りしきる雪が積もるように
subtitles.english: Like the falling snow piling up,

subtitles.original: この街でただあなたを想う
subtitles.english: I'm just thinking of you in this town.

subtitles.original: 離れていても同じ空が
subtitles.english: Even though we're apart, the same sky,

subtitles.original: どうか見えてますように
subtitles.english: I hope you're looking at it.

subtitles.original: 生まれて届いた優しい声が響く耳元に
subtitles.english: A gentle voice that was born and reached me resonates in my ears.

subtitles.original: あなたが残した道しるべ
subtitles.english: The signpost you left behind.

subtitles.original: 世界が切り離された夜
subtitles.english: The night the world was torn apart,

subtitles.original: また目をつむる
subtitles.english: I close my eyes again.

subtitles.original: くだらないことで笑った幸せを感じてたきっと
subtitles.english: Laughing at silly things, I'm sure I felt happy.

subtitles.original: 特別じゃない日々をもっと二人でただ過ごしたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to spend more ordinary days just with you.

subtitles.original: 季節が何度変わろうと隣にいたいよね
subtitles.english: No matter how many seasons change, I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: それ以上何もいらないから
subtitles.english: I don't need anything more.

subtitles.original: 降りしきる雪が積もるように
subtitles.english: Like the falling snow piling up,

subtitles.original: 遠い街でただあなたを想う
subtitles.english: I'm just thinking of you in a distant town.

subtitles.original: 触れ合うことができなくても
subtitles.english: Even if we can't touch each other,

subtitles.original: 変わることなく あぁ
subtitles.english: nothing will change, ah...

subtitles.original: 何度だってそう振り返れば
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I look back,

subtitles.original: あの日のあなたの言葉が 声が 会いたくなるんだよ
subtitles.english: your words and voice from that day make me want to see you.

subtitles.original: 何度だってそう信じ合えれば
subtitles.english: No matter how many times, if we believe in each other,

subtitles.original: いつでも二人繋がっていられる あぁ
subtitles.english: we can always stay connected, ah...

subtitles.original: 雪明かり照らすこの街にも
subtitles.english: Even in this town lit by snow,

subtitles.original: いつかは優しい春が芽吹く
subtitles.english: a gentle spring will bud one day.

subtitles.original: ここでまた会えたその時は
subtitles.english: So that when we meet here again,

subtitles.original: 涙こぼさないように
subtitles.english: I won't shed any tears.

subtitles.original: 冬の終わりを告げる淡雪
subtitles.english: Light snow announcing the end of winter,

subtitles.original: そのひとときに願いをのせる
subtitles.english: I place my wish on that moment.

subtitles.original: どんな季節も景色も
subtitles.english: In any season or scenery,

subtitles.original: あなたと共に同じ場所で感じてたい
subtitles.english: I want to feel it in the same place as you.

subtitles.original: 街に柔らかな風が吹いて
subtitles.english: A soft breeze blows through the town,

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな花が咲くその日を
subtitles.english: and colorful flowers bloom on that day.

subtitles.original: 待ち続ける二人にも あぁ
subtitles.english: For the two of us who keep waiting, ah,

subtitles.original: 春が訪れますように
subtitles.english: I hope spring comes.

subtitles.original: 笑顔でまた会えますように
subtitles.english: I hope we can meet again with a smile.

subtitles.original: 歌よ
subtitles.english: Song

subtitles.original:
作詞：中村佳穂
作曲：Ludvig Forssell
subtitles.english:
Lyrics: Kaho Nakamura
Composition: Ludvig Forssell

subtitles.original: （アカペラ）
subtitles.english: (A cappella vocalizing)
